thoughts.text: Now that we have saved the URL of the website we visited earlier to a file, let's use the `read_file` command to read the contents of the file and ensure the URL was saved correctly. This will help us verify that the information we have gathered so far is accurate.

- Review the contents of the file to ensure the URL was saved correctly
